website_summaries.verdict: The last one to go on the tree, this pickle that's just 3.5 inches high will set a good challenge for who can spot it.
pros: This design is traditionally made in hand-blown glass and hand painted
Also other style variations including a pickle chip and mini gherkin
Comes with a card explaining the German pickle ornament tradition
cons: It's fragile, and like all small, ornaments it should be placed where small children or pets can't get to it

customer_reviews.title: This is styrofoam, not blown glass.
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS NOT BLOWN GLASS! It's styrofoam and very ugly. It looks nothing like the picture. It is not an Old World Ornament and came in a bubble package. It is being returned today. Order from Brommer's instead.
customer_reviews.author: Zach's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Cheap looking, questionable if actually glass blown
customer_reviews.text: Arrived today and intended as a Christmas gift. For nearly $9, I think I could have bought three at my local Target and still saved money. I own many, many hand-blown authentic glass ornaments and never have I seen a glued seem in an ornament before. The pickle itself looks cheap, like a dollar-store knock-off. The gifting box proudly presents a product label which cannot be removed, therefore for gifting purposes this is nothing but trash. I'm beyond disappointed. I will repackage the ornament and still gift it, but will never buy from Old World Christmas again, and strongly recommend you don't either.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: Thank goodness I found this!
customer_reviews.text: I gave one of these pickles to my son for Christmas when he was a child (a special joke between us). When he & his family were decorating their tree this year, his 2 year old son decided to launch said pickle in the air & it hit a wall & smashed. My son was so sad he immediately texted me to tell me. I said don't worry, I'll find another one- (fingers were crossed I could). I looked on Amazon & found a few actually, but this one, is the exact same one. Thank you-
customer_reviews.author: P. J. Welch

customer_reviews.title: Unique and attention-getting
customer_reviews.text: What a great idea for an ornament! My spouse and I buy one special, yearly ornament to celebrate the coming new year, and this was our 21st one. It wasn't expensive, but it's relatively heavy glass will last for years to come. We were just so impressed with its uniqueness. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: James L T

customer_reviews.title: A nice glass pickle ornament.
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice glass pickle ornament. About 3” long and deep dark green. We hide the pickle in the tree to see who opens the first gift. We lost our old pickle - probably left it on a tree that was thrown out. This pickle seems to be a decent item for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Carlisle, PA

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Not too big to hide in the tree for this old German tradition. Made of glass so it is fragile. Liked that the shade of green will blend in with my Christmas tree rather then a true pickle color. Our first year for this new tradition. This ornament will be easy to hide.
customer_reviews.author: A. Customer

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: We just learned about the pickle ornament tradition and this ornament is perfect! It arrives in a pretty package, has the story inside, and is a well made traditional glass ornament. Our friends were thrilled with theirs, as we are with ours! We will be buying more for gifts next Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Every family needs one!
customer_reviews.text: Well packaged to insure it arrived safely. My sons teacher years ago, related the legend my son insisted I get one for the family tree. Now that he is one his own, he asked to have the pickle for his tree. Of course I had to get another!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara E. Stolar

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my new German son-in-law, thinking it was a tradition every German knew. He was not familiar with the "pickle" tradition. LOL
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: What I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful ornament. It came very well packed and arrived on time. A little smaller than I expected but I should've looked at the descriptions better.
customer_reviews.author: karen wescott

customer_reviews.title: Brought back some great memories
customer_reviews.text: This pickle ornament is great! I used to have one long ago that was gifted to me by one of my German teachers but it was lost after several moves. This one is identical and came with a cute box. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: LaShai

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter because she loves pickles! She loved seeing her special pickle ornament on the tree.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria t

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Liked the workmanship, was just as advertised. Used as a gift. Would buy this again. Card enclosed explains tradition.
customer_reviews.author: Marguerite Mullins

customer_reviews.title: Cute ornament
customer_reviews.text: I got this for an ornament exchange at work. It was a hit! It was so pretty and it came packaged great!
customer_reviews.author: Maegan Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for price
customer_reviews.text: Gotta love the traditional pickle for the Christmas tree. Looked great. Nice quality for price.
customer_reviews.author: Sheefang

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than I thought, but accurate
customer_reviews.text: I do love this, I wish I would've read the dimensions though. I got the regular pickle. It is much larger than I expected but the dimensions are correct, just didn't read them first
customer_reviews.author: Car710

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. I purchased as a replacement for one that broke. Arrived quickly and was perfect
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Great for Pickle lovers
customer_reviews.text: I am eating a pickle as I write this...enough said (also, the shipment came on time and was in-tact).
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: My daughters and I started thepickle tradition this year - it was really hard to find this ornament in the tree! They had fun hunting and I had fun watching them. It has a very old look to it, but it’s not too fragile.
customer_reviews.author: Susie Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Happy Shopper!
customer_reviews.text: I've bought several of these for family members. I've never received one broken so they are packaged nicely. I like the deep green color. Also they are not real big so they are easy to store in my ornament case. As our family grows I plan on buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Robbie Black

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS!! I’ve already bought probably 6 and gifted them to my very confused, very amused friends. It’s funny and adorable, and has a nice old timey look.
customer_reviews.author: Sonya P.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice appearance and size. Still haven't found the little one I originally had growing up as this is on the medium end of what I have seen. Good item for the price, but gonna go to plastic as my kids shattered it within 24 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pickle Ornament
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter, who loves pickles. She loved it.
customer_reviews.author: DeliGirlgood

customer_reviews.title: The Christmas Pickle!
customer_reviews.text: We started a new tradition a few years ago with the Christmas pickle. Whoever finds the pickle gets a small gift. We no longer limit to hiding in the tree because it’s pretty competitive with adults looking as hard as the grandkids! Sometimes we hide again, just for the fun of the hunt!
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Altieri

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful gift!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift and my cousin absolutely loved it. For the pickle lover in your life this is a great gift!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: The perfect Xmas pickle.
customer_reviews.text: I bought several glass pickles before I settled on this one. It's a deep dark green that actually blends into the tree. We hide it Xmas eve so bright glittery pickles did not work for us. Came packaged well in a cute box. I will buy another in case this gets dropped in the future. Dry happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Laura B

customer_reviews.title: Old style
customer_reviews.text: Old world lore, modern day tree. Made well, makes the tree interesting
customer_reviews.author: Reviews from a guy

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and great story behind the "pickle ornament"
customer_reviews.text: Gave it to my 7yr old for Christmas and the meaning behind the pickle ornament, and now it's going to be a tradition to find the pickle ornament every year!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kourtney

customer_reviews.title: A generational ornament.
customer_reviews.text: The pickle itself is true to pickle color. The ornament is the size of a card (credit card) very lightweight and sturdy. It is definitely an ornament that can be passed down through generations as well as the story behind it. I can not wait for one of the children to find it on Christmas day.
customer_reviews.author: Kenisha

customer_reviews.title: Love this ornament
customer_reviews.text: Love this ornament! Purchased it for an ornament exchange at work and the person who got it actually knew the tradition behind it and had been looking for one herself. Very happy with this purchase. The ornament is a bit tiny, so it is important to be careful when unwrapping the item and you need a hook in order to hang it. Will purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Well packaged printed box, makes a nice gift
customer_reviews.text: Great pickle. Looked good on the tree and was fun to see who found it first
customer_reviews.author: Ms Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Create a family tradition finding the pickle on your Christmas tree.
customer_reviews.text: Delicate blown glass pickle looks great hidden on my Christmas tree. The dull green finish hides nicely among other shiny items on the branches, though the golden topper is a visual giveaway to family when they are searching for it.
customer_reviews.author: JimV67

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great customer service! And the pickle is just like the one from my childhood.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: I love this. Have it for a Christmas game. Perfect
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Burk

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a gift for my sister....it was part of a pickle themed gift basket....This ornament came quickly, was very reasonably priced, and is exactly as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: It comes in a cute old world box and it's nicely wrapped. I recommend it and look forward to gifting it.
customer_reviews.author: Nola985

customer_reviews.title: It’s. A. Pickle.
customer_reviews.text: It’s the pickliest of pickle ornaments. I mean, pickle Rick would be so proud, he’d wish everyday was Christmas and he was hidden in a tree in plain sight for everyone to find.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon M.

customer_reviews.title: Price marked on ornament less then Amazon price
customer_reviews.text: Ornament perfect but tag on it shows price of $6.00. I paid $10.82 from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: J. H.

customer_reviews.title: Realistic with good color
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with it does not look fake at all. Great for a pickle lover year round not just for the tree lol
customer_reviews.author: JMMM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great ornament. Something I always had and then my son had one. It got dropped by his sister and shattered so we quickly ordered another one. It is the real deal, glass ornament.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Traditional Pickle Ornament
customer_reviews.text: The pickle ornament has been a tradition in our house since my son was born. Now my son has a baby and he and his wife were excited to receive this to carry on the tradition at their own house.

customer_reviews.title: Mhhh  it was ok
customer_reviews.text: This ornament didn’t have a secure way to attach it to the tree.

customer_reviews.title: Blends in with the tree!
customer_reviews.text: It looks exactly like a pickle and arrived in great condition.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Adorable and looks so good on the tree. Will probably order more as X-mas gifts for others.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Just as described
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 3rd grade class to study Christmas in Germany! The students loved searching for it!

customer_reviews.title: It’s big
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed because it thought is was the smaller one. I’ll have to get another because the big kids are going to be able to find it with they’re eyes closed!!!
customer_reviews.author: Todd Schumann

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Just what I expected. I love the pickle on my tree for the kids too find.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Schoonover

customer_reviews.title: I like the material and the look of it but the ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this pickle ornament to hide in the christmas tree. I like the material and the look of it but the size is really big. It will work for a couple of years as my kids are still little but then I will have to get a much smaller one otherwise it will be too easy to spot!
customer_reviews.author: Pataschuh

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality - Prime is awesome
customer_reviews.text: we opened our Christmas ornaments and discovered that our Christmas pickle was broken! We use this ornament every year as part of our family tradition. Ordering through Prime got it here on December 23rd. It looks exactly like our last one. Thanks so much Amazon!

customer_reviews.text: It arrived broken. And now, it is saying it’s not available to order another one.

customer_reviews.title: A fun christmas tradition!
customer_reviews.text: A christmas classic! We've had one for years and we found this to give to friends so they could enjoy "hiding the pickle" too!

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was very unhappy with the size when I open the box, it was not what I expected. I was ordering this for my daughter for a gift for Christmas and I already had one of my own of the Old World Collection. I took the measurement of my mine and ordered from that and that is not what I received....buy it was to late to send back 1 day before Christmas Eve!

customer_reviews.title: Crimmus Pickle Saves the Night
customer_reviews.text: We hid it in our tree and made our friends find it. It was fun.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my niece for Christmas and it was super cute, she loved it.

customer_reviews.title: Not very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Very cute but looks a little used, definitely not new which is disappointing. Also did not come with the little hanger to put in tree, Not very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: This ornament is perfect and I love the christmas tradition that comes along ...
customer_reviews.text: Our grand daughter's nickname is Pickle. This ornament is perfect and I love the christmas tradition that comes along with it.
customer_reviews.author: Leah M Jenks

customer_reviews.title: Green Pickle Ornament
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with the entire process of ordering "The Pickle Ornament". Actually, I ordered 4 of them and am also very pleased with the ornaments. They are perfect. I am having a lot of fun hiding them and encouraging my sons to hide them in their trees for their kids to find.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Brigham

customer_reviews.title: Christmas in Japan
customer_reviews.text: Currently stationed in Japan and hanging a pickle on the Christmas tree is a family tradition. Thankfully this purchase allowed me to keep the tradition alive. Also it arrived on time and safe. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hide the pickle
customer_reviews.text: It's a very nice ornament and a great tradition to carry on with my kids.

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't ask for more!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed. Nicely boxed. Perfect! Delivery was speedy. OMG who could ask for more. ! Price perfect.

customer_reviews.title: It's beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Sorry, this ornament was in the box with larger items, we found it today. It's beautiful!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: First time doing this and we had so much fun trying to find the pickle.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Baker

customer_reviews.title: Was hoping for better quality
customer_reviews.text: My family has been hiding a pickle on the tree since I before I can remember. This ear one of my sister's got married, and the other is engaged. As they will both be starting their own family soon, I ordered a pickle for each of them. They arrived quickly, and very well packed; however you can see the lines where they were cast, which takes a lot away fro the ornament. I suppose I expected more from an Old World Christmas ornament.
customer_reviews.author: Eleanore

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: Guess I should have read the description more closely! I have one that a friend gave me and wanted one to give as a gift. I won't be giving it as it's way too big
customer_reviews.author: busy mom

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: The Old World Christmas ornaments are beautiful, and the quality is excellent. I gave them to my family, and they loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Jan N

customer_reviews.title: My son is thrilled!
customer_reviews.text: The pickle is a bit smaller than I'd envisioned, but I find that's good because our tree isn't huge and it hides better. We've had a great time with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: I received this product in 3 day during christmas season! I bought two for Christmas gifts and I loved how there was a description of the tradition attached to the ornament- it is a nice touch for those who are unaware of the tradition.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: The legend of the pickle
customer_reviews.text: What an adorable, cute, fun decoration. Is glass and the detail is realistic. Ordered Friday night and arrive safely bubble wrapped in perfect condition today (Monday). Only sorry I didn’t order several more for gifts.
customer_reviews.author: MGreene

customer_reviews.title: Delicate, cheerful colored ornament for Christmas Tree game.
customer_reviews.text: I am Swiss American. We hang this pickle inside our Christmas Tree each year and then play a game where our ( now grown up kids )hunt for this pickle. Whoever finds the pickle wins cash. We’ve been doing this since I was a child. Now that our kids are grown, we needed to get new ornaments for them for their families. The ornament is delicate and the colors are cheerful. Hard to find deep inside the Christmas Tree. Will buy more soon. Fast delivery too
customer_reviews.author: Laugette.

customer_reviews.title: the pickle brings good luck. After all the other ornaments were hung ...
customer_reviews.text: According to German tradition, the pickle brings good luck. After all the other ornaments were hung on the tree, the pickle ornament was hidden somewhere within the branches. On Christmas morning, the first child to find the gherkin was rewarded with an additional small present left by St. Nicholas. The pickle tradition encourages youngsters to enjoy the many ornaments on the tree before checking to see what St. Nick has brought them.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki H.

customer_reviews.title: Christmas tree pickle
customer_reviews.text: Bought this pickle ornament for my son's first Christmas tree in his new house. The ornament is good quality and good size. It came packaged well and in a timely fashion. I would not hesitate to recommend this to anyone who might be interested in this ornament.
customer_reviews.author: S. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Just like when I was little!
customer_reviews.text: This is the genuine one! There is no difference between this ornament and the one my mom got in the 80's and had throughout my childhood! A great gift for a young family to begin a fun Christmas tradition!
customer_reviews.author: Liz.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace our former pickle that broke.... This is much bigger, but really well made! I was really thrilled by the quality as well as the delightful box that the pickle came in. It is PERFECT. This would make a great gift. I would just open the box up and replace the bubble wrap around the pickle with some Christmas tissue paper. And then share the joy of the Pickle Story and tradition with other families.... :)
customer_reviews.author: Tropicaldaze

customer_reviews.title: great addition to the christmas tree!
customer_reviews.text: After visiting friends in Washington and learning of the christmas pickle tradition; I purchased this pickle ornament for my family and I so we could have our own fun at christmas time when our own family and friend came over. Over all the pickle ornament is well made. The only downside is the top connecting piece that hangs to the tree. This is a little weak, and if handled in correctly it may become loose and could break if proper care is not taken. Other than that, it is a great size and well made. Very enjoyable addition for christmas time!
customer_reviews.author: Josh M

customer_reviews.title: I hate that I paid $14
customer_reviews.text: I hate that I paid $14.00 for this especially since the price says $5.99 right on it...... That one is on me..... However for the price it should have been nicely packaged and came with a hook to hang it. It looks used to me but I'm not sure.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne

customer_reviews.title: Not the best deal!
customer_reviews.text: It is glass and it looks nice but it is way over priced! Retail tag on the item is $6.99! MADD in China. Better prices available.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas F. Silvia

customer_reviews.title: Good quality ornament
customer_reviews.text: My 10yr old was turned onto the pickle hiding tradition and chose this to be this years ornament. He chooses one every year. It arrived fully intact and was packaged well. It is also good quality. Doesn’t feel super thin.Happy with it
customer_reviews.author: EvRuth

customer_reviews.title: Pickles Rule
customer_reviews.text: Gave the pickle for an ornament exchange and people were interested and curious about the pickle ornament tradition and loved the quality of the ornament itself.
customer_reviews.author: Gritty

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my granddaughter go loves pickles! Just moved out on her own and will have a pickle on her tree!
customer_reviews.author: Margie Rosenthal

customer_reviews.title: It’s a gift that not only affordable but can be passed down for many Christmases to come.
customer_reviews.text: I loved this item! This year we decided we would make new holiday traditions to make Christmas that much more special and magical. We had so much fun trying to find the pickle! It blended in perfectly with out Christmas tree.
customer_reviews.author: Emma Ocasio

customer_reviews.title: it won't ever go bad.
customer_reviews.text: This pickle was smaller than I expected, but it's very high quality. It's the first ornament I bought after moving into my new home, and I think I'll treasure it forever. I'm assuming since it's not a REAL pickle, it won't ever go bad.
customer_reviews.author: J-mar

customer_reviews.title: Being the first one to find the pickle in the Christmas tree.
customer_reviews.text: Bought the pickle and the book that tells the story of the pickle. Sooooo cute!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Miller (Samantha Miller)

customer_reviews.title: Cute ornament
customer_reviews.text: Really cute. Came quickly. Wrapped up tighter than my Midwest friends during the polar vortex. Never heard of the old game. Got because my pups name is Pickles. Not kidding.
customer_reviews.author: Phishing in the Rockies

customer_reviews.title: Great ornament - true to color!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice ornament! The golor is a beautiful deep green (like the picture). I was a little concerned about what the color would be as most of the other pickle ornaments listed on Amazon had comments from reviewers that the pickles were a sickly light green color. That is definitely not the case with this vendor's ornament. It arrived in great conidition and earlier than the estimated delivery date, so I was very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Ozzy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Glass Blown "Christmas Pickle" Ornament
customer_reviews.text: A beautiful ornament! Lovely details! A Christmas Gift for Family Members! Wonderful Packaging! Arrived well before due date and in perfect condition! Thank you!

customer_reviews.title: Cut fun tradition!
customer_reviews.text: Great little Christmas gift to add to a newly weds gift set.

product_meta.title: Old World Christmas Ornaments: Pickle Glass Blown Ornaments for Christmas Tree
product_meta.description: Size:StandardLong ago when parents decorated the Christmas tree they hung the pickle ornament last, hiding it in the green boughs. When the children were allowed to view the tree, they would begin searching for the pickle ornament because they knew they would receive an extra gift for being the most observant.
feature_bullets: ORNAMENTS FOR CHRISTMAS TREE: Hand crafted in age-old tradition with techniques that orginated in the 1800s
CHRISTMAS DECORATIONS: Molten glass is mouth-blown into finely carved molds
UNIQUE GIFTS: Ornaments are all hand-painted and glittered in a series of labor-intensive steps to achieve the beautiful creations
PICKLE ORNAMENT: Traditionally designed, hand-crafted ornaments
SIZE: Ornament Dimensions in Inches: 3.5 x 2 x 1.5

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars853 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
